title.en: Merched y Wawr Maenclochog Branch - Visit to Cardiff
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Maenclochog - Taith i Gaerdydd 2007

description.en:
Merched y Wawr Maenclochog, Medi 2007. Arian Loteri i ymweld â Chaerdydd.  Tu fas y Senedd, Bae Caerdydd. Cefn – Ann Morris, Tryphena Willaims, Ogwen Phillips, Sheila Vaughan, Haulwen Davies, Mai Morris a Mary Llewellyn
Blaen – Peggy Phillips, Beryl John, Eiry Phillips, Maureen George, Gillian Phillips, Gretta Gibby, Eirianwen Thomas, Vi Edwards
description.cy:
